author: ayaxlabombarda
title: InnovatioFounder KYC & AML Process
description: The Innovatio Founder needs to comply with EU KYC & AML regulations to offer his crowdfunding service to European users and link on-chain transactions to real identities.

f6_assessments.q0: If Cardano wants massive adoption, KYC & AML will be needed. To start with European Regulations will help to understand the potential of scalability from Cardano network. New users need to rely on confidence with whom they are doing a crowdfunding process and DeFi. Having this into the point, the proposal from Innovatio Founder follows and satisfies the guidelines of the challenge. It’s a high-impact process that could generate great exposure to the Cardano ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1:
Superb idea from Innovatio to make this proposal with ProofSpace. Both are from Catalyst so they have the necessary experience to develop this project.  Furthermore, there are some extra documents in this proposal presenting the teams and their previous experiences in Funds.

The plan seems to be review in detail, with clear tasks to accomplish (integrations phases that are the key points are perfectly described). The crowdfunding platform will directly benefit from the plan and could be used in the future as a “case of use” for further projects in the ecosystem. The budget is more than fair considering that this project needs licensing and integration with a good work hours distribution according to plan.
f6_assessments.q2: KPIs are very clear and easy measurable due to new users verified with KYC & AML through the platform. This means also will be measured by the third-party European Regulators and any other user that participate in the Innovatio crowdfunding service and has contact with the community in it. Last but not least, this proposal has a double audit due to collaboration with ProofSpace. I would only add a brief survey to the users that got verified to know and measure the satisfaction of User Experience at the KYC process.

f6_assessments.q0: I find this proposal very attractive in bringing the Cardano ecosystem closer to European regulations. It is a topic that is currently on the lips of all the crypto media and even public and private banks. Therefore, I find Innovatio's proposal for this challenge very accepted. It will be a new entrance for investors and projects in the DeFi area that are being created and will be created in the future, generating trust between the parties involved in the use of the services.
f6_assessments.q1: In this proposal present ProoSpace which was also born in Catalyst. An interesting combo to ensure the success of the proposal. The plan details a follow-up workflow, with updated documentation of the equipment. In turn, today they are neatly managing previously funded proposals. On the other hand, the plan is correctly detailed to be carried out successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: KPIs are the right ones focused on users, which is a basic component of BYC and AML. Additionally, deliverables can be found to track the submitted proposal. Finally, this process is a key point for Innovatio itself regarding the crowdfunding platform that they are developing, financed by previous funds.

f6_assessments.q0: Innovation and ProofSpace are a perfect match, as Innovatio is a Crowdfunding platform funded on Foundation 7 along with ProofSpace with credentials interoperable in other blockchain ecosystems. They were especially allowing Innovatio users to sign up with document and selfie verification (using ProofSpace's Onfido integration) and sign in with SSI OAuth. of the original Cardano De-Fi platform for startups and blockchain projects in the European market, leading to greater adoption and growth. The team also predicted possible risks. With all the above ideas, I see the success of this project.
f6_assessments.q1:
"The people involved in the project are excellent, and the information you give is very detailed and precise. You created a lot of confidence for the community and me when you gave a link explaining the management. Workload https://docs.google.com/document/d/1xkE9MMoJGXWKLl9Lkdh7c-R3hH1nn7XdMsZzRSE9LCY/edit?usp=sharing There, I can find sponsored proposals and percentage of work completed make up the total amount of work required for the closing report as well as information about your team.
In addition, I feel that the amount of $60,000 you asked for in this proposal is perfectly reasonable. You have given a particular budget for the project. I firmly believed in the project's feasibility when I read your submission. It is detailed and full of information."
f6_assessments.q2: In general, you have identified the KPIs for each indicator very clearly. I like the project transparency, as every project deliverable described in your blueprint will be visible to the community through monthly reports. However, please put in several commitments for each indicator that you will make each month, through which the community can determine if the project is on track.

f6_assessments.q0: The problem statement of this proposal is quite clear, explaining the need for Innovatio to comply with European regulations on KYC and AML, allowing the expansion of the native Cardano application to the entire European Union, matching the instructions of the challenge. I find this proposal very appealing in bringing the Cardano ecosystem closer to European regulations. I believe this proposal can increase the impact of a highly scalable De-Fi application. This proposal will have huge dynamics as it seeks to implement a KYC & AML-based solution SSI PRISM in compliance with European regulations, expanding the reach of the original Cardano De-Fi platform for companies start-ups and chain projects in the European market. This recommendation is necessary for the platform's adoption, growth, and potential capital flows.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal's plan is very clear, we know what will happen in great detail, the proponent divides the time into months stating what activities will be developed and what results will be achieved in the future of each activity. This is very active, so we have a very clear view of the process
The $60,000 required budget is also very well explained, we know what the total amount will be divided into. In other words, we have a very precise vision of where that money is going
The team provides good documentation to identify the members and their skills, a link to their website and profile is provided and indicates that this project is a continuation of an existing project. from fund7 "Innovatio Crowdfunding Launchpad", which gives a plus for confidence in the ability to successfully execute this project.
f6_assessments.q2:
A very detailed plan is presented, and the proponent is very transparent about the funding, which clearly shows the honest motives of the proponent. Several deliveries are presented in the route section. Besides, the proposal also provides some KPIs to make it easier for the community in the audit process such as:
-Number of users using the workflow to submit their IDs and face scans to complete KYC & AML.
-Number of users who have properly completed the KYC & AML process.
The success of the project is the implementation of the proposed Workflow that will lead to a simple, practical, and efficient KYC/AML process according to European regulations, where users can scan and link their physical IDs and transfer facial recognition

solution: Implement PRISM-based KYC & AML for Innovatio's Crowdfunding platform based on European Union requirements, with custom workflows and easy SSI implementation via ProofSpace.
experience: Innovatio is a Crowdfunding Launchpad that is soon to launch its MVP and ProofSpace is a multi-network Sovereign Identity (SSI) platform, wrapped with no-code tools to build SSI workflows and ecosystems. (check external links).
